data.oai_dc:dc: The cross-stream diffusivity in the Southern Ocean (75S to 30S) for the period 2005 to 2015. The diffusion coefficients are calculated using the theory of Ferrari and Nikurashin (2010). The dataset includes the suppressed and unsupressed diffusivities, as well as the supression factor (the ratio of the unsuppressed and suppressed diffusivity)
